 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

com.ctriposs.bigmap
接口 IBigConcurrentHashMap

所有超级接口：
java.io.Closeable
所有已知实现类：
BigConcurrentHashMapImpl
public interface IBigConcurrentHashMap
extends java.io.Closeable

方法摘要
 long BackFileUsed()
          The size of back file used
 void clear()
          Removes all mappings from this hash map, leaving it empty.
 byte[] get(byte[] key)
          Returns the value of the mapping with the specified key.
 boolean isEmpty()
          Returns whether this map is empty.
 byte[] put(byte[] key, byte[] value)
          Maps the specified key to the specified value.
 byte[] remove(byte[] key)
          Removes the mapping from this map
 void removeAll()
          remove all data in the map, including backing file.
 int size()
          Returns the number of elements in this map.
 
从接口 java.io.Closeable 继承的方法
close
 

方法详细信息

BackFileUsed

long BackFileUsed()
                  throws java.io.IOException
The size of back file used

返回：
used back file size
抛出：
java.io.IOException - exception throws during file IO operation

clear

void clear()
Removes all mappings from this hash map, leaving it empty.

另请参见：
isEmpty(), size()

get

byte[] get(byte[] key)
           throws java.io.IOException
Returns the value of the mapping with the specified key.

参数：
key - the key.
返回：
the value of the mapping with the specified key, or null if no mapping for the specified key is found.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - exception throws during file IO operation

isEmpty

boolean isEmpty()
Returns whether this map is empty.

返回：
true if this map has no elements, false otherwise.
另请参见：
size()

put

byte[] put(byte[] key,
           byte[] value)
           throws java.io.IOException
Maps the specified key to the specified value.

参数：
key - the key.
value - the value.
返回：
the value of any previous mapping with the specified key or null if there was no such mapping.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - exception throws during file IO operation

remove

byte[] remove(byte[] key)
              throws java.io.IOException
Removes the mapping from this map

参数：
key - to remove
返回：
value contained under this key, or null if value did not exist
抛出：
java.io.IOException - exception throws during file IO operation

size

int size()
Returns the number of elements in this map.

返回：
the number of elements in this map.

removeAll

void removeAll()
               throws java.io.IOException
remove all data in the map, including backing file.

抛出：
java.io.IOException - exception throws during file IO operation.
